text: Fedor Mikhailovich Dubiansky (; 1760 - 4 August 1796) was a Russian amateur musician and the author of the romance "A rock-dove moans" () after the text of Ivan Ivanovich Dmitriev. He drowned while crossing the Neva in 1796, aged 36. ==References== Category:Russian composers Category:Russian male composers Category:1760 births Category:1796 deaths Category:Deaths by drowning
title: Fedor Mikhailovich Dubiansky
